content: the winter beanie crochet pattern is a fairly easy crochet beanie to work featuring beautiful textured stitches the crochet hat is worked in my favourite way - from the bottom up you will work the brim of the hat is row using slip stitches and then the rest of the beanie is worked in rounds a free written copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com/winter-beanie-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 16 sts x 16 row of half_double_crochet in 3rd loop = 4 inches finished size 9 x 9 inches laid flat 20-22 inch circumference yarn heartland by lion brand yarn 100% acrylic 5 oz/142g 251 yds/230 m 1 ball acadia hook size h/8 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions yarn needle
